trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Three Rivers
There were no other sightings in Three Rivers on or around March 19th 2012
Summary: {flg} photo taken of storm over San antonio texas
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working out in a oil field I heard of storm Hitting San antonio so I got out of our company truck and took a picture of the storm cloud that hit that night the Three rivers area I didnt realize I had taken pictures of object in sky until I got home and shared it with my lady. I did not hear any noise or even know I had taken those photos of the objects until I got home. I did contact John Schwab here in San antonio today to talk to him on this I did text him the photo he is the San antonio Mufon ufo rep for texas
